item.title: Tools
item.description: CMSeeK CMS Detection and Exploitation suite Responder responder -i tun0 Hping3 hping3 -S 10.10.10.10 -a 10.10.10.11 -p 22 –flood Bettercap bettercap -X -I wlp2s0 -T 172.18.10.40 –proxy -P post https://github.com/diego-treitos/linux-smart-enumeration https://github.com/joaogmauricio/redhttpd
